name: Marketing Sample App
description:
The marketing sample app should be used as a template and reference for channels whose main function is to drive awareness, traffic, and sales through promotion and advertising on other platforms.


Note that this use case differs from the Marketplace sample app which provides guidelines for channels that make products available for purchase on a separate platform.


This file uses BigCommerce BigDesign.

Download the BigDesign UI Kit.

Read more on BigDesign components here.
